title: HRVRD - From the Bird's Cage (2013) - FLAC
description:
Hrvrd's second official album "From the Bird's Cage" released on 2013 leans more towards the bands experimental side compared to their last album "The Inevitable and I". This album brings out a mellow tone that evolves into a symphony of sounds. 



Album: From the Bird's Cage (2013)
Artist: HRVRD ( Previously "Harvard" )
Genre: Indie Rock, Experimental Rock
Format: FLAC 16-bit / 44.1khz
